scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/reactRouterExtension.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/reactRouterExtension.min.js
